addSong.title: Add Song
addSong.placeholder: Search in history or use song link
addSong.insufficientPermissions: Sorry, you are not allowed to add songs :(

altTexts.arrowBack: Arrow to go back one step
altTexts.arrowOutward: Diagonal arrow pointing up and to the right, indicating external content
altTexts.dragHandle: Symbol for a handle, allowing list item rearrangement by dragging
altTexts.error: Exclamation mark inside a jagged circle
altTexts.help: Question mark surrounded by a circle to display additional information
altTexts.info: Circle with an 'i' inside, representing information
altTexts.logo: OpenSoundQueue logo with the letters 'osq' and a white line underneath interrupted by a circle
altTexts.logoAndText: OpenSoundQueue logo with the letters 'osq' and the spelled-out name 'OpenSoundQueue' beside it
altTexts.playlistAdd: Queue symbol with a plus sign, indicating the ability to add new songs to the queue
altTexts.sortingArrowDown: Arrow pointing down, indicating sorting direction
altTexts.sortingArrowUp: Arrow pointing up, indicating sorting direction
altTexts.undo: An arrow pointing back to undo the changes
altTexts.userVerified: A User symbol and an additional check, indicating this user is verified
altTexts.selectAll: An grid of big rectangles of equal height and width, indicating all of them are selected
altTexts.selectNone: An grid of small rectangles of equal height and width, indicating none of them are selected
altTexts.invertSelection: An grid of rectangles where half of the rectangles are bigger than the rest, indicating the selection can be inverted
altTexts.volumeUp: Plus symbol indicating an increase of the volume
altTexts.volumeDown: Minus symbol indicating an decrease of the volume

currentSongEmpty: There is currently no song playing

entryCode.title: Entry-Code
entryCode.validation: The entry code is exactly 6 characters long

help.voteSkip: By clicking the skip button, you can vote to skip the current song (this requires a vote of half of all active users).

loginCTA: Want to add your own songs?

logout.callToAction: In order to access this page, you need to be logged out.

notifications.queueAddError: Song could not be added to the queue.

installation.fetchError: Settings could not be loaded. Please reload the page.
installation.saveLanguageError: Unable to save Language. Please try again.
installation.savePrivacyError: Unable to save Privacy Settings. Please try again.
installation.saveSourcesError: Unable to save Source Selection. Please try again.

password.title: Password
password.validation: Minimum of 8 characters long, upper case letter, lower case letter, number and special character

deleteUser.part1: Are you sure you want to delete User

editRole.unsavedChanges: There are unsaved changes. Do you want to save them?
editRole.deleteError: An error occurred when deleting the role
editRole.createError: A Role with this name already exists
editRole.newRoleRedirectError: The role must first be given a name before further settings are possible

queueEmpty: There are no songs in queue

logout.callToAction: In order to access this page, you need to be logged out.

username.title: Username
username.validation: Minimum of 4 characters long, can contain numbers, dots (.) and underscores (_)

registration.explanation: We have sent a code to your email address, please check your inbox.
registration.heading: Create an account

noCode.error: Something didn't work. Please try again.
noCode.success: We have sent you a new code.
noCode.text: I have not received a code

registration.verifiedCTO: Account was created. Continue with next steps.

emailAuth.title: Email Authentication
emailAuth.description: People have to enter and verify their email address when creating an account

privateRoom.title: Private Room
privateRoom.description: A private room is protected with an entry code.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: Select the Sources from which users can retrieve song links. (At least one)
sources.error: You have to at least select one source

defaultLanguage.title: Default Language
defaultLanguage.description: Specify the default language for all users

deleteSongs.label: Delete
deleteSongs.error: The selected songs could not be deleted.
